personalInfo.name: Muhammad Usman Khan
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer & Odoo Expert
personalInfo.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in Odoo ERP development, web applications, and cloud solutions. Committed to delivering high-quality, scalable software solutions that drive business growth.

heroSection.description: A passionate Full Stack Developer and Odoo Expert, dedicated to creating innovative solutions that help businesses thrive in the digital age.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.description: With over 3 years of experience in software development, I specialize in building robust web applications and customizing Odoo ERP solutions. My expertise spans across modern web technologies and enterprise software development.
highlights: Developed 50+ custom Odoo modules for various industries
Built scalable web applications using Next.js and React
Expertise in Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript
Strong background in database design and optimization
Experience with cloud deployment and DevOps practices

skillsSection.title: Skills & Expertise
skillsSection.description: A comprehensive overview of my technical skills and professional capabilities across various technologies and domains.

experienceSection.title: Professional Experience
experienceSection.description: My professional journey and the impact I've made at various organizations throughout my career.

experiences.description: Leading the implementation of ERP systems for clients, ensuring seamless integration and increased operational efficiency. Developing custom web and mobile applications tailored to meet clients specific business needs.
achievements: Led implementation of ERP systems for clients
Developed custom web and mobile applications
Built Hospital Management System with 50+ apps

experiences.description: Developed full-fledged Odoo modules with frontend in Owl and XML-RPC and backend in Python. Improved company reputation by enhancing employee benefits and satisfaction.
achievements: Developed full-fledged Odoo modules with Owl frontend
Built backend systems in Python with XML-RPC
Improved company reputation and employee satisfaction

experiences.description: Successfully developed a comprehensive Car Repair Management System. Implemented customized modules to enhance system functionality and streamline operations.
achievements: Developed comprehensive Car Repair Management System
Implemented customized modules for enhanced functionality
Ensured seamless integration and user-friendly interface
